attributes.action: make the UK  a neutral land - Withdraw from all countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should withdraw from all countries. We have no right to be in any of them, and if we leave them alone, then the terrorists will not have a reason to attack us, and we will have a lot more money to spend on hospitals rather than bombs...it's not rocket science really...
